title: Pokey LaFarge Mines His Midwestern Roots, Finds 'Something In The Water'
teaser: To mark the release of his seventh album, the singer-songwriter brings his acoustic guitar to the Fresh Air studio to sing some new songs as well as some of his favorites from the 1920s and '30s.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
